name: df-watsN
body: |- wceq(cwpointsN, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(catm, cv(s0)), cdif(cfv(catm, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cpolN, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s1)))))))
comment: Define W-atoms corresponding to an arbitrary "fiducial (i.e. reference) atom" ` d ` . These are all atoms not in the polarity of ` { d } ) ` , which is the hyperplane determined by ` d ` . Definition of set W in [Crawley] p. 111. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2012.)
